title: Can Wout van Aert Still Hang with Van der Poel and Pogačar? Crunch Time for Visma-LAB’s Cobblestone Captain
content:
Is this the year WVA will finally win Flanders or Roubaix? Question more urgent than ever with rise of teammate Jorgenson and historic performances of arch-rivals.

Read the full article at Can Wout van Aert Still Hang with Van der Poel and Pogačar? Crunch Time for Visma-LAB’s Cobblestone Captain on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
